title: Day 226
content:
# Day 226

Can't stop thinking about this video. I fear Bo is right.

<iframe src="https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?type=text%2Fhtml&key=a19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07&schema=twitter&url=https%3A//twitter.com/sovrynmindset/status/1587957800243716096&image=https%3A//i.embed.ly/1/image%3Furl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fabs.twimg.com%252Ferrors%252Flogo46x38.png%26key%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07" title="" height="281" width="500"></iframe>

I see myself spending more and more time online. There are things about it that are great. The ability to learn and connect with people I would not be able to otherwise. I also feel like my dopamine receptors are being fried and my eyes hurt from staring at a screen all day at work only to come home and start staring at a screen more.

I'm going to overcome. I will figure it out. These companies don't own me. They are just a tool that I can choose to use or not to use. Speaking of I need to journal on paper more. I appreciate what Medium provides and will still be writing for at least 365 days. I just think there is also value in writing down your thoughts on paper rather than typing everything.

Until tomorrow.

11/3/22

Conor Jay Chepenik
